Package dev.orne.test.rnd.params

Class PropertyTypeGenerator<T>

java.lang.Object
dev.orne.test.rnd.params.AbstractTargetedGenerator<T>
dev.orne.test.rnd.params.PropertyTypeGenerator<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of generated values
All Implemented Interfaces:
TargetedGenerator<T>
@API(status=EXPERIMENTAL, since="0.1") public class PropertyTypeGenerator<T> extends AbstractTargetedGenerator<T>
Implementation of TargetedGenerator that generates random values of the type a target property.
Since:
0.1
Version:
1.0, 2022-11
Author:
(w) Iker Hernaez

    • targeting

      public static <T> PropertyTypeGenerator<T> targeting(@NotNull @NotNull Field field)
      Creates a new generator targeting the specified field.

      The validation class will be the class declaring the field.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of generated values.
      Parameters:
      field - The target property field.
      Returns:
      The created generator.

    • targeting

      public static <T> PropertyTypeGenerator<T> targeting(@NotNull @NotNull Class<?> cls, @NotNull @NotNull String property)
      Creates a new generator targeting the specified property of the specified class.

      The specified class will be used as validation class.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of generated values.
      Parameters:
      cls - The class containing the property.
      property - The property name.
      Returns:
      The created generator.

    • getValidationClass

      @NotNull public @NotNull Class<?> getValidationClass()
      Returns the class containing the target property. Used when extracting the property constraints, as constraints can be declared in overridden getters.
      Returns:
      The class containing the target property.
